snippet.title: ChromaGun 2: Dye Hard - Official Developer Walkthrough Video | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Join the creative director at Pixel Maniacs for a closer look at gameplay from ChromaGun 2: Dye Hard, an upcoming FPS game where a gun that shoots colors is the key to solving puzzles and helping you reach deeper areas in the ChromaTec testing facility. ChromaGun 2: Dye Hard will be available on PC. In ChromaGun 2: Dye Hard, objects that share the same color will gravitate together; there are also various switches, chickens, boxes, sinister drones, ramps, and oodles of other interactive and potentially non-hazardous elements that you will encounter in this comedic and delightfully sarcastic narrative.
